articles.author: Herman Mostert
articles.title: Lions go down to Stade Francais after second half horror show - News24
articles.description: A second half horror show saw the Lions go down 17-7 to Stade Francais in their European Challenge Cup clash at the Stade Jean-Bouin in Paris.
articles.content:
A second half horror show saw the Lions go down 17-7 to Stade Francais in their European Challenge Cup clash at the Stade Jean-Bouin in Paris on Saturday.

articles.title: ECDC assesses risk to the EU/EEA associated with Omicron XBB1.5 sub-lineage - European Centre for Disease
articles.description: In a Threat Assessment Brief released today, the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) assesses the overall level of risk to the EU/EEA associated with the spread of the Omicron XBB.1.5 SARS-CoV-2 sub-lineage as low for the general populat…
